name: Ary Barroso
description: '''Ary Evangelista de Resende Barroso''' {{post-nominals|post-noms=[[National Order of Merit (Brazil)|ONM]]}} (Portuguese pronunciation: {{IPA|pt|aˈɾi baˈʁozu|}}; 7 November 1903 – 9 February 1964) was a Brazilian composer, pianist, soccer commentator, and talent-show host on radio and TV. He was one of Brazil's most successful songwriters in the first half of the 20th century. Barroso also composed many songs for [[Carmen Miranda]] during her career.
